001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json.JsonPathExtractor;
005import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
006import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
007
008/**
009 * Configures database interaction components.
010 *
011 * <p>This class defines essential beans for handling JSON-based database interactions.
012 * It provides an {@link ObjectMapper} for JSON processing and a {@link JsonPathExtractor}
013 * for extracting values from JSON responses.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Configuration
018public class DbInteractionAutoConfiguration {
019
020   /**
021    * Provides a default {@link ObjectMapper} instance for JSON processing.
022    *
023    * @return A singleton {@code ObjectMapper} bean.
024    */
025   @Bean
026   public ObjectMapper defaultObjectMapper() {
027      return new ObjectMapper();
028   }
029
030   /**
031    * Configures a {@link JsonPathExtractor} bean for extracting values from JSON-based query responses.
032    *
033    * @param objectMapper The {@code ObjectMapper} used for JSON processing.
034    * @return A {@code JsonPathExtractor} instance.
035    */
036   @Bean
037   public JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor(ObjectMapper objectMapper) {
038      return new JsonPathExtractor(objectMapper);
039   }
040}
